mapper.sql: subject_id, subject_name, start_time, end_time, create_time, subject_poster
mapper.select:
select
from t_b_subject where now() between start_time and end_time
mapper.insert:
insert into t_b_subject
subject_id,
subject_name,
start_time,
end_time,
create_time,
subject_poster,

mapper.update:
update t_b_subject
subject_name = #{subjectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
subject_poster = #{subjectPoster,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where subject_id = #{subjectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_b_subject set subject_name = #{subjectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, subject_poster = #{subjectPoster,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where subject_id = #{subjectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
